job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen, implementeren en optimaliseren van generatieve AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and refinement of AI solutions, which falls under the core definition of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: expertise in Retrieval-Augmented Generation Systems (RAGS), Large Language Models (LLMs)
job_tasks.justification: Specific mention of RAGS and LLMs indicates hands-on work with generative AI models and their implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeren en optimaliseren van generatieve AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: While 'implementeren' is also part of modeling, in the context of 'oplossingen' (solutions), it implies building and deploying these models into a functional system, aligning with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: zorg je voor AI-systemen die snel, nauwkeurig en impactvol zijn
job_tasks.justification: Focus on creating functional AI 'systems' that are 'fast, accurate, and impactful' points to the software engineering aspect of building and ensuring the performance of these systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bent de schakel tussen data en output - je zorgt ervoor dat onze modellen precies datgene leveren wat onze klanten nodig hebben.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the role in bridging the gap between raw data/models and delivering customer-ready outputs, a key aspect of applied software development.

soft_skills.phrase: zorg je voor AI-systemen die snel, nauwkeurig en impactvol zijn
je zorgt ervoor dat onze modellen precies datgene leveren wat onze klanten nodig hebben

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, implementing, and optimizing generative AI solutions, specifically mentioning LLMs and RAGS. It also highlights building functional AI systems that deliver value to customers, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
